message: Let's split it in a traditional way. I'll take more since the money is worth less with each round.
You took 75 in the first round, I'll take 80 this time. Your turn again!
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide it like this. The value of your share is slightly more than last round, while mine reflects the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
You took 61.03, now it's 10. The value of money is decreasing fast, I'm taking a risk, but I think I can do better next time.
